metadata.title: CVE-2016-3990 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the horizontalDifference8 function intif_pixarlog.c in LibTIFF 4.0.6 and earlier allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (crash) or execute arbitrary code via a craftedTIFF image to tiffcp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6').
